title: 複雑な宣言2
question: ???に入るのはなに
source:
<color=#da70d6>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdio.h></color>
<color=#da70d6>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdlib.h></color>

<color=#358cd6>int</color> add<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#358cd6>int</color> a,<color=#358cd6>int</color> b<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
  <color=#c586c0>return</color> a + b;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>

<color=#358cd6>int</color> sub<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#358cd6>int</color> a,<color=#358cd6>int</color> b<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
  <color=#c586c0>return</color> a - b;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>

<color=#358cd6>int</color> <color=#ffd700>(</color>*select<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#358cd6>int</color> i<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>(</color>int,int<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
  <color=#c586c0>return</color> i == 0 ? add : sub;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>

<color=#358cd6>int</color> main<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>
<color=#ffd700>{</color>
  printf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"%d
"</color>,select<color=#ffd700>(</color>0<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>(</color>5,3<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  <color=#c586c0>return</color> 0;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>
